game.description: In this quest, you will embark on a dangerous journey to retrieve a lost artifact hidden deep within a treacherous cave. Your mission is to find the artifact and bring it back to the quest giver.
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the cave

tasks.objective: Reach the inner chamber of the cave
Find the correct path through the maze
Defeat the powerful guardian to access the artifact

game.title: The Lost Artifact
